mapper.insert: insert into TB_TBCOPYRIGHTMULTI( USER_ID, MEDIA_NAME, MEDIA_THEME, KEYWORD, PAY_TYPE, DESCR, PATH, TYPE, AUDIT_STATUS, PRICE, UPLOAD_TIME, UPD_TIME, STATUS, SPREAD_NUM, CLICK_NUM, TBCOPYRIGHTMULTI_ID ) values ( #{USER_ID}, #{MEDIA_NAME}, #{MEDIA_THEME}, #{KEYWORD}, #{PAY_TYPE}, #{DESCR}, #{PATH}, #{TYPE}, #{AUDIT_STATUS}, #{PRICE}, #{UPLOAD_TIME}, #{UPD_TIME}, #{STATUS}, #{SPREAD_NUM}, #{CLICK_NUM}, #{TBCOPYRIGHTMULTI_ID} )
mapper.update: update TB_TBCOPYRIGHTMULTI set USER_ID = #{USER_ID}, MEDIA_NAME = #{MEDIA_NAME}, MEDIA_THEME = #{MEDIA_THEME}, KEYWORD = #{KEYWORD}, PAY_TYPE = #{PAY_TYPE}, DESCR = #{DESCR}, PATH = #{PATH}, TYPE = #{TYPE}, AUDIT_STATUS = #{AUDIT_STATUS}, PRICE = #{PRICE}, UPLOAD_TIME = #{UPLOAD_TIME}, UPD_TIME = #{UPD_TIME}, STATUS = #{STATUS}, SPREAD_NUM = #{SPREAD_NUM}, CLICK_NUM = #{CLICK_NUM}, TBCOPYRIGHTMULTI_ID = TBCOPYRIGHTMULTI_ID where TBCOPYRIGHTMULTI_ID = #{TBCOPYRIGHTMULTI_ID}
mapper.select: select USER_ID, MEDIA_NAME, MEDIA_THEME, KEYWORD, PAY_TYPE, DESCR, PATH, TYPE, AUDIT_STATUS, PRICE, UPLOAD_TIME, UPD_TIME, STATUS, SPREAD_NUM, CLICK_NUM, TBCOPYRIGHTMULTI_ID from TB_TBCOPYRIGHTMULTI where TBCOPYRIGHTMULTI_ID = #{TBCOPYRIGHTMULTI_ID}

select a.USER_ID, a.MEDIA_NAME, a.MEDIA_THEME, a.KEYWORD, a.PAY_TYPE, a.DESCR, a.PATH, a.TYPE, a.AUDIT_STATUS, a.PRICE, a.UPLOAD_TIME, a.UPD_TIME, a.STATUS, a.SPREAD_NUM, a.CLICK_NUM, a.TBCOPYRIGHTMULTI_ID from TB_TBCOPYRIGHTMULTI a

select a.USER_ID, a.MEDIA_NAME, a.MEDIA_THEME, a.KEYWORD, a.PAY_TYPE, a.DESCR, a.PATH, a.TYPE, a.AUDIT_STATUS, a.PRICE, a.UPLOAD_TIME, a.UPD_TIME, a.STATUS, a.SPREAD_NUM, a.CLICK_NUM, a.TBCOPYRIGHTMULTI_ID from TB_TBCOPYRIGHTMULTI a
mapper.delete:
delete from TB_TBCOPYRIGHTMULTI where TBCOPYRIGHTMULTI_ID in
